description: [APT5](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1023) has used malware with keylogging capabilities to monitor the communications of targeted entities.(Citation: FireEye Southeast Asia Threat Landscape March 2015)(Citation: Mandiant Advanced Persistent Threats)

external_references.description: FireEye. (2015, March). SOUTHEAST ASIA: AN EVOLVING CYBER THREAT LANDSCAPE. Retrieved February 5, 2024.
